episodeTitle: A Team is Formed! Save Chopper
episodeTitleJapanese: チーム結成!チョッパーを救え
description: The Straw Hat Pirates reunite with Toriko and Komatsu when Chopper falls ill with Deep Sea Fever. The combined crews journey to Tou-Chinese Island and brave the four seasonal chambers of the Mush Room tower to gather ingredients for the only cure.
arcName: One Piece x Toriko Crossover Special

events.title: Luffy Emerges from Harusame
events.description: While Toriko and Komatsu are fishing, Luffy unexpectedly emerges from the mouth of a Harusame they just caught, reuniting the crews once again.
events.significance: Kicks off the crossover collaboration between the One Piece and Toriko crews for this special episode.

events.title: Chopper Falls Ill with Deep Sea Fever
events.description: When the Thousand Sunny arrives, the crew discovers that Chopper has contracted Deep Sea Fever, a deadly illness that drastically lowers and raises body temperature and will end his life unless treated with a specific cure.
events.significance: Establishes the central conflict and urgency of the episode, driving the quest to save Chopper.

events.title: Quest for the Seafood Fruit Begins
events.description: Toriko and Komatsu explain that the only cure for Deep Sea Fever is the Seafood Fruit combined with Four Seasons Golden Sauce. The combined crews decide to head to Tou-Chinese Island to find these rare ingredients.
events.significance: Sets up the adventure and establishes the goal that drives the rest of the episode.

events.title: Arrival at Tou-Chinese Island
events.description: The Straw Hats and Toriko's group arrive at Tou-Chinese Island, a deserted island shaped like an upside-down oriental ramen bowl, located between the worlds of One Piece and Toriko.
events.significance: Introduction of the special crossover location where the main adventure takes place.

events.title: Discovery of the Mush Room Tower
events.description: The group discovers the Mush Room, a colossal tower-shaped mushroom at the center of the island that contains four separate chambers, each maintaining a different season: Winter, Autumn, Summer, and Spring.
events.significance: Reveals the unique dungeon-like structure that contains the ingredients needed to cure Chopper.

events.title: Teams Split to Gather Ingredients
events.description: The combined crew splits into teams to simultaneously gather the four seasonal ingredients needed for the Four Seasons Golden Sauce: Zoro, Robin, Usopp, and Coco head to Summer; Sanji, Franky, Sunny, and Rin to Autumn; Luffy and Toriko with Zebra to Winter.
events.significance: Strategic division of the crew to efficiently gather all necessary ingredients before time runs out.

events.title: Summer Team vs. Banjyan Tiger
events.description: In the sweltering Summer chamber, Zoro, Robin, Usopp, and Coco encounter and battle a fierce Banjyan Tiger to obtain the chili paste ingredient needed for the cure.
events.significance: One of three simultaneous battles to gather ingredients, showcasing teamwork between One Piece and Toriko characters.

events.title: Autumn Team vs. Eight Horned Boar
events.description: In the Autumn chamber with falling red leaves, Sanji, Franky, Sunny, and Rin face off against an Eight Horned Boar to secure the herb seasoning ingredient.
events.significance: Parallel battle showcasing Sanji's combat prowess and collaboration with Toriko allies.

events.title: Winter Battle: Luffy and Toriko vs. Raochutan
events.description: In the harsh, snowy Winter chamber, Luffy and Toriko team up to battle a powerful Raochutan creature to obtain the Raochu Spring liquor ingredient while enduring extreme blizzard conditions.
events.significance: Highlights the teamwork and combat synergy between the two series' protagonists.

events.title: Summer Team Defeats Banjyan Tiger
events.description: Zoro's team successfully defeats the Banjyan Tiger and secures the chili paste from the Summer chamber.
events.significance: Successful acquisition of the first ingredient needed for the cure.

events.title: Autumn Team Defeats Eight Horned Boar
events.description: Sanji's team successfully defeats the Eight Horned Boar and obtains the herb seasoning from the Autumn chamber.
events.significance: Successful acquisition of the second ingredient needed for the cure.

events.title: Luffy and Toriko Defeat Raochutan
events.description: Working together with devastating combined attacks, Luffy and Toriko defeat the Raochutan and secure the Raochu Spring liquor from the Winter chamber.
events.significance: Successful acquisition of the third ingredient, demonstrating the power of collaboration between the two protagonists.

events.title: Breaking Through to Bloom the Mango Karin
events.description: The crew realizes the Mango Karin flower in the Winter chamber cannot bloom without sunlight. Luffy and Toriko combine their strength to break through the Mush Room's cap, allowing sunlight to flood in and bloom the final ingredient.
events.significance: Creative problem-solving that secures the fourth and final ingredient needed for the cure.

events.title: Four Seasons Golden Sauce Created
events.description: Komatsu expertly combines all four seasonal ingredients to create the Four Seasons Golden Sauce, completing the cure for Deep Sea Fever.
events.significance: Komatsu's culinary expertise comes through, creating the vital sauce needed to save Chopper.

events.title: Chopper is Cured
events.description: The crew administers the steamed Seafood Fruit dipped in Four Seasons Golden Sauce to Chopper, successfully curing him of Deep Sea Fever and restoring him to full health.
events.significance: Resolution of the episode's central conflict, celebrating the success of the collaborative mission.

themes.description: The episode emphasizes the power of collaboration between different crews and universes, as the Straw Hats and Toriko's allies work together seamlessly to save Chopper.
themes.symbolism: The four seasonal chambers requiring simultaneous exploration symbolizes how different strengths and approaches must work in harmony.

themes.description: The crews demonstrate unwavering dedication to saving Chopper, risking their lives in dangerous battles across the Mush Room's chambers.
themes.symbolism: The unified quest to cure a sick crewmate reinforces the bonds of nakama (friendship/comradeship) central to One Piece.

characterSpotlights.development: Chopper's illness serves as the catalyst for the entire adventure, though he remains mostly bedridden throughout.
keyActions: Falls ill with Deep Sea Fever
Is successfully cured by the combined efforts of both crews

characterSpotlights.development: Luffy teams up with Toriko once again, showcasing his combat abilities and leadership in the Winter chamber battle.
keyActions: Emerges from the Harusame to reunite crews
Helps break through the Mush Room cap

characterSpotlights.development: Toriko leads the quest to save Chopper, utilizing his gourmet knowledge and combat prowess.
keyActions: Explains the cure for Deep Sea Fever
Breaks through the Mush Room cap

mangaDifferences.difference: This entire episode is anime-original content and does not appear in the One Piece manga, as it is a crossover special with Toriko.

trivia.fact: This is the second crossover between One Piece and Toriko, following Episode 492.
The episode was aired as a one-hour special alongside Toriko Episode 51, celebrating one year of the Toriko anime's broadcast.
Funimation skipped this episode during their simulcast and home releases because they did not have the rights to Toriko at the time.

sources.title: Crunchyroll Adds 2 One Piece x Toriko Crossover Specials

trivia.fact: The episode opened with a Devil Fruit introduction segment (Gomu Gomu no Mi), mimicking Toriko's typical episode format rather than the standard One Piece opening.
The initial broadcast lacked a traditional opening theme, with only a special eyecatcher separating it from the preceding Toriko episode.
Tou-Chinese Island is described as being 'located between the world of One Piece and Toriko,' emphasizing its nature as a crossover-exclusive location.
